sections.summary:
Customer-focused management professional, with successful track record of leading and managing teams . Quality-oriented and proactive in
resolving issues with exceptional organizational and communication skills. Self-starter with a positive, can-do attitude who is driven to learn,
improve and succeed.

billing, billing system, budgets, budget, business management, cold-calling, client, customer service, data analysis, database, facilities maintenance,
